price: Álif. Lam. Ra’. Éstos son los versículos del Libro, una recitación clara.
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
